mapper.select: select gameinfo.game_id, gameinfo.name, gameinfo.deadline, gameinfo.aim, gameinfo.left_price, gameinfo.is_end, gameinfo.is_approve, gameinfo.thumbnail, gameinfo.created_at, gameinfo.updated_at, gameinfo.started_at, gameinfo.cnt, DATEDIFF(gameinfo.deadline, now()) as left_day, user.nickname, user.profile from (select game.game_id game_id, game.name name, game.deadline deadline, game.aim aim, game.left_price left_price, game.is_end is_end, game.is_approve is_approve, game.nickname nickname, game.thumbnail thumbnail, game.created_at created_at, game.updated_at updated_at, game.started_at started_at, game_lank.cnt cnt from (select same_genre.game_id, count(game_like.nickname) cnt from (select distinct game_genre.game_id from indie.game_genre, indie.user_genre where user_genre.nickname =#{nickname} and game_genre.genre_id = user_genre.genre_id)same_genre left outer join indie.game_like on same_genre.game_id = game_like.game_id group by same_genre.game_id order by cnt desc limit 5)game_lank left outer join indie.game on game.game_id = game_lank.game_id) as gameinfo left outer join indie.user on gameinfo.nickname = user.nickname order by gameinfo.cnt desc;
